org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser

Class ReadOnlyClassToSerializerMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser.ReadOnlyClassToSerializerMap

  • public final class ReadOnlyClassToSerializerMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Optimized lookup table for accessing two types of serializers; typed and non-typed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Object,JsonSerializer<java.lang.Object>> _map
      NOTE: keys are ClassPairKeys (for "typed" serializers) and JavaTypes (untyped)
      (package private) SerializerCache.TypedKeyFull _typedKeyFull 
      (package private) SerializerCache.TypedKeyRaw _typedKeyRaw
      We'll reuse key class to avoid unnecessary instantiations; since this is not shared between threads, we can just reuse single instance.
      (package private) SerializerCache.UntypedKeyRaw _untypedKeyRaw

      • instance

      • from

        public static ReadOnlyClassToSerializerMap from(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Object,JsonSerializer<java.lang.Object>> src)
        Factory method for creating the "blueprint" lookup map. Such map can not be used as is but just shared: to get an actual usable instance, instance() has to be called first.
